channel.title: Combat Help
channel.description:
Ok, Basically when you have no weapon on and do punch it gives strength xp when you do kick it gives defence xp and when you do block it gives attack xp.
Any idea on how to change it so it is the normal way.
Please Help,
iiLovePvP
